column4: hello, got an interesting prob.  Ubuntu has been failing to load lately its say: FATAL: module minix not found, Mount: mounting /dev/hdb1 or /root failed, any ideas how ot fix?
maybe a problem with grub? I am running a dual boot
I can mount the drive from a live CD and all is still accessable.
what version of ubuntu ? and what did you do as last before that occured ?
